entry.title: Taproot NACK
entry.summary: The email is from a person named Damian A. James Williamson, who refers to himself as Lord His Excellency James HRMH (& HMRH) of Hougun Manor & Glencoe & British Empire. He clarifies that he has titles recorded in both Scotland and England, as well as in Australia's account with names recorded. He mentions that he is not a Prince, but if any Prince titles came, they were retained to be considered not accepted or refused. He also talks about his title of being Lord with feudal and Lord with the appointments direct to the service of the monarch's house Earl and similar up to Duke and King, which is usually the monarch's preference. There is a comment from R E Broadley via bitcoin-dev list pointing out that James is not noble nor a Lord. Another person named Eric Voskuil responds that even if he had a legit title, it wouldn't warrant additional attention. The email includes links to projects such as willtech.com.au, go-overt.com, and earn.com/willtech, as well as a LinkedIn profile for Damian Williamson. It also provides contact information including a mobile number and fax number. The email concludes by stating that it does not constitute general advice and should be disregarded if misdelivered.
